sections.title: Policy Co-Benefits
sections.sub_title: Participants in The Strategy Room were asked to rate the importance of the strategies they were recommending resulting in the following:

votes.dataviz_chart_title: New goods, jobs or services for the local area
People are healthier
There is less poverty
People will feel a stronger sense of community

sections.title: Outcome and experience
sections.sub_title: Participants in The Strategy Room were asked to rate how satisfied they were with the recommendations they made, and how much they enjoyed taking part in The Strategy Room

votes.dataviz_chart_title: Satisfaction with the recommendations made by my group
Experience of taking part in The Strategy Room

sections.title: Feasibility of Policies
sections.sub_title: Participants in The Strategy Room were asked how much they agreed with the following statements.

votes.dataviz_chart_title: I like the idea of electric vehicle investment
I can imagine a strategy of electric vehicle investment working here
I like the idea of redeveloping town centres
I can imagine a strategy like redeveloping town centres working here
I like the idea of a subscription-based service for all local transport
I can imagine a strategy like a subscription-based service working here

sections.title: Fairness of Policies
sections.sub_title: Two policies in The Strategy Room elicited participants perceptions of fairness.

votes.dataviz_chart_title: Everyone's council tax will subsidise the electric car club, even if they rarely use it themselves
Some people will receive a cash payment to get rid of their petrol/diesel car

sections.title: Desirability of Policies
sections.sub_title: Participants in The Strategy Room were asked how much they agreed with the following statements.

votes.dataviz_chart_title: I would like to live in an area where rents included energy costs
I would like to live in an area where the council invested in making social housing more energy efficient

sections.title: Concern about Policies
sections.sub_title: Participants in The Strategy Room were asked how worried they were about the impact of these policies.

votes.dataviz_chart_title: Private landlords will pass on the costs of renovations to tenants
The council will take on a high level of debt to fund investment in social housing

sections.title: Community Energy Policy Benefits
sections.sub_title: Participants in The Strategy Room were asked how appealing the following potential benefits of a community energy scheme would be.

votes.dataviz_chart_title: Ability to personally make money
Creating new jobs in the area
Pride in knowing that energy is produced locally
Protection from global energy security concerns

sections.title: Investing in Community Energy
sections.sub_title: Participants in The Strategy Room were asked whether they would invest in a community energy scheme.

votes.dataviz_chart_title: Investing in Community energy
votes.dataviz_checkbox_text: I would invest in a community energy scheme with a good rate of return

votes.dataviz_chart_title: Investing in Community energy
votes.dataviz_checkbox_text: I'd like to invest but I'm not in that position right now.

votes.dataviz_chart_title: Investing in Community energy
votes.dataviz_checkbox_text: I wouldn't invest in a community energy scheme.

sections.title: Policy Co-Benefits
sections.sub_title: Participants in The Strategy Room were asked to rate how important the following benefits were to them in relation to the policy of local and sustainably-sourced food in schools and hospitals

votes.dataviz_chart_title: Benefit to the local economy
People eat healthier, tastier food
It’s part of the fight against climate change

sections.title: Choosing what to buy or where to shop
sections.sub_title: Participants in The Strategy Room were asked to what extent they agreed with the following statements in relation to the policy of environmental ratings for supermarket chains.

votes.dataviz_chart_title: I currently think about what is healthy when making food choices
I currently think about the environment when making food choices
I would look at environmental ratings to help me choose where I shop
